caption: Table 1: Performance comparison between BCD and SSNS under different regularization parameters for the ImageNet experiment in Section 5. The convergence tolerance is set to Etol = 10−8. Left: cost matrix based on the l₁-distance. Right: cost matrix based on the squared Euclidean distance.
description: This table compares the performance of BCD and SSNS algorithms under various regularization parameters (η) for the ImageNet experiment.  It shows the runtime (in seconds) and the number of iterations required by each algorithm to reach the convergence tolerance (Etol = 10⁻⁸). The comparison is shown separately for cost matrices based on the l₁-distance and the squared Euclidean distance.
section: A.3 Impact of the regularization parameter

caption: Table 1: Performance comparison between BCD and SSNS under different regularization parameters for the ImageNet experiment in Section 5. The convergence tolerance is set to \(\epsilon_{tol} = 10^{-8}\). Left: cost matrix based on the \(\ell_1\)-distance. Right: cost matrix based on the squared Euclidean distance.
description: This table compares the performance of BCD and SSNS algorithms under different regularization parameters (\(\eta\)) for the ImageNet experiment.  It shows the computation time and number of iterations required for each algorithm to converge to a solution, using both \(\ell_1\) and squared Euclidean distance as cost matrices. The results highlight how the choice of \(\eta\) and cost function impact performance.
